name: Bury Tomorrow
description: '''Bury Tomorrow''' are a British [[metalcore]] band formed in 2006 in [[Southampton]], Hampshire, England. The band is composed of six members; lead vocalist Daniel Winter-Bates, bassist Davyd Winter-Bates, drummer Adam Jackson, lead guitarist Kristan Dawson, who replaced founding guitarist Mehdi Vismara in 2013, rhythm guitarist Ed Hartwell, and keyboardist and vocalist Tom Prendergast, who both replaced Jason Cameron in 2021. Bury Tomorrow have released eight studio albums, their most recent being ''[[Will You Haunt Me, with That Same Patience]]'', released on 16 May 2025.
